Statute.Title: Small Business Investment Grants Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Bonification d’intérêts au profit des petites entreprises, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Small Business and Tourism (SI/2017-7); the Department of Industry to provide support (2018, c. 18, s. 3 and SI/2018-59)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1980-81-82-83 c. 147 proclaimed in force 19.05.83 see SI/83‑112
